```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tseries)
```

```{r}
highcamp <- dhist %>% dplyr::group_by(urlsolid) %>% dplyr::summarise(count = n_distinct(donation_id)) %>% arrange(desc(count))
toppedout <- highcamp[1:32, ]
```


```{r}
c1 <- dhist %>% dplyr::filter(urlsolid == "6ybheh-lights-on-4-lizzy")
c1d<-ts(c1$amount)
acf(c1d, lag.max = 15, plot = TRUE)
head(c1)
```

```{r}
adf.test(c1d, alternative = "stationary", k = 0)
```
